modShortDescription: Find it odd that first aid bandages are only made with plain cloth when you have all these bandages waiting to be smeared with that aloe?
modDescription:
Find it odd that first aid bandages are only made with plain cloth when you have all these [bandages](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-medical-supplies/) waiting to be smeared with that sweet, sweet aloe? Now you have choices! Smear away!

## Changelog

Updated for A19.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/theredwolf13/theredwolf13_Modlets/tree/master/theredwolf13_First%20Aid%20Bandage)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/25283-theredwolf13s-modlets-a19/).
